ai-tika-s0304t3:2_0: Remembering the truth of extinguishment: this is the simile of all conditions, who have discovered the truth of the path, in conformity with the truth, in order to explain, clarity, discrimination, owing to truth, the meaning is that truthful.
ai-tika-s0304t3:2_1: For what is the ground for attaining the truth, and for that relies on the ultimate sense of urgency, and the object of the vanity, and the ultimate sense that is called concept as its object. When greed has reached Nibbāna, the ultimate sense of urgency, the path, and the ultimate extinguishment by the vanity. When greed ends in it, the path, the ultimate continuation of extinguishment, and the path, the preventing for extinguishment.
